name: py-optuna

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Optuna is an automatic hyperparameter optimization software framework,
particularly designed for machine learning. It features an imperative,
define-by-run style user API. Thanks to our define-by-run API, the code
written with Optuna enjoys high modularity, and the user of Optuna can
dynamically construct the search spaces for the hyperparameters.

dependencies.description:
Lightweight Covariance Matrix Adaptation Evolution Strategy (CMA-ES)
implementation.

dependent_to.name: py-cupy
dependent_to.description:
CuPy is an open-source array library accelerated with NVIDIA CUDA. CuPy
provides GPU accelerated computing with Python. CuPy uses CUDA-related
libraries including cuBLAS, cuDNN, cuRand, cuSolver, cuSPARSE, cuFFT and
NCCL to make full use of the GPU architecture.
